Simply send us your inquiry email at CONTACT US if you need further information about a particular type of furniture needed also. It Will be our satisfaction to meet the Customers needs.

company.company_content:
Temukan Kualitas, Keunikan, dan Pilihan Gaya yang Beragam untuk Produk Meubel Berkualitas Tinggi!

Bersama dengan pekerja berpengalaman, kami Vista Homedeco berusaha untuk memberikan yang terbaik dalam memproduksi produk meubel berkualitas tinggi. Dibuat dengan tenaga ahli yang terlatih dan menggunakan bahan baku utama kayu solid wood seperti jati, sungkai, mindi, dan mahogany, kami memastikan bahwa setiap produk yang kami hasilkan mencapai hasil optimal.

Kami tidak hanya memenuhi kebutuhan pasar lokal, tapi juga menjangkau pasar internasional seperti Malaysia, Singapura, Taiwan, Dubai Emirate, Prancis, dan Spanyol. Produk kami memiliki fokus pada gaya skandinavin, retro, dan industrial, sehingga dapat memberikan pilihan yang beragam bagi konsumen.

Kami telah menyelesaikan beberapa proyek besar seperti meja kafe dan resto, pengisian ruang, interior hotel, dan proyek custom. Diantara proyek besar tersebut adalah hotel Lenora Bandung dan Hotel Al Bait Sarjah Dubai Emirate. Kami juga terus mengembangkan diri dengan mengikuti pameran di dalam dan luar negeri seperti IFFINA 2014 & 2015, IFEX 2016 2017 2018 2019, dan TEI Expo 2015 2018. Sebagai mitra binaan BI, kami berkomitmen untuk memberikan produk meubel berkualitas tinggi dan pelayanan yang memuaskan.

Kami menunggu dengan hangat kedatangan anda di showroom kami. Hubungi kami sekarang untuk mendapatkan penawaran terbaik!

company.company_content:
Welcome to Jepara Perabot. We are Furniture Manufacturer and International Exporter of indoor and outdoor furniture. We produce world-class quality wooden furniture products with solid sungkai, teak, mahogany, pine, oak and walnut. We have further expanded our customers based on exporting to countries all over the world.

Jepara Perabot presents wide range Furniture at its finest with different design and models that fit customers` needs and taste, which have been proven as market leader and of utmost reliability. Our Furniture collection is simply divided into five categories, Stool, Table, Desk, Cabinets and Dining Chairs. These collections are available in both simple design. Hope you enjoy our collections of furniture as much as we enjoy making it.

Our production always set up a high standard of controlling starting from choosing the materials, processing, constructing, finishing to packaging, to keep the best quality. We have been essential to use kiln-dried wood before processing. Therefore, our furniture won’t lose its beauty and silky texture. Jepara Parabot is under  the management of CV Kinatama dan have warehouse are located in Jepara, Central Java, Indonesia.

The warehouse is supported with modern wood working machinery and production quality control. Furthermore, the production teams are consisting of reliable and professional persons. Our price is considerably ready to compete against the market prices.

company.company_content:
Kota Jati: Jeparaâ€™s Premier Furniture Manufacturer

As the largest furniture factory in Jepara, Central Java, Kota Jati has been a trusted name in high-quality furniture manufacturing since 1988. We specialize in crafting premium products from Teak, Mahogany, Sungkai, Mindi, Steel, and Aluminium, as well as Plywood and MDF with carefully selected veneers. Committed to sustainability, we maximize resource efficiency by recycling offcuts into smaller products and using them to fuel our wood-drying kilns. Our dedication to environmental responsibility extends to our extensive photovoltaic panel array, reducing our carbon footprint.

State-of-the-Art Manufacturing Facilities

Spanning over 18 hectares, our factory operates with a dynamic workforce of 1,200 to 1,500 skilled professionals, depending on the season. Every stage of production is handled in-house, ensuring quality control and efficiency.

  • Material Processing & Drying
    • Our undercover log storage and multiple sawmills ensure optimal raw material management.
    • 20+ wood-drying kilns, each with a 40-cubic-meter capacity, allow us to maintain a steady supply of dried boards for 4-6 months of production, reducing lead times and ensuring seamless production.
  • Precision Engineering & CNC Technology
    • Our material preparation department is equipped with cutting-edge machinery, including 3-axis and 5-axis CNC machines, as well as the advanced Bacci Twin Jet 7-axis CNC machining center.
    • Hundreds of other machines, from rip and crosscut saws to copy shapers and double-ended tenoners, enable precision craftsmanship.
  • Advanced Gluing & Laminating Capabilities
    • Our state-of-the-art pressing technology, including hydraulic, A-frame, cold, hot, and high-frequency presses, allows for versatile and efficient material bonding.
    • Custom chair clamping machines enable us to deliver durable and innovative designs tailored to our clients' needs.
  • Metal Fabrication & Finishing
    • Our in-house metal department specializes in steel and aluminium furniture, utilizing advanced technology such as CNC laser cutting, CNC pipe bending, and TIG welding.
    • We also manufacture synthetic rattan-covered aluminium furniture, ensuring durability and design versatility.
  • World-Class Finishing Expertise
    • Our skilled finishing team applies highly technical, multi-step finishes with precision, meeting the most demanding client specifications.

Dedicated to Excellence in Service

Behind every successful project is our dedicated marketing team, committed to providing personalized, professional service. No request is too smallâ€”we work diligently to ensure every clientâ€™s vision is brought to life with precision and care.

Letâ€™s create something extraordinary together. Contact our team today to discuss your project.

Â

company.company_content:
Vassilissa Furniture: Crafting Timeless Styles for Modern Living

Welcome to Vassilissa Furniture, where we blend the allure of modern, retro, and Scandinavian styles to create furniture pieces that elevate your living spaces. We ensure every aspect of our company profile resonates with our commitment to quality, style, and customer satisfaction.

About Us

At Vassilissa Furniture, we believe that furniture should be more than just functional; it should be a reflection of your unique taste and personality. Founded in [year], our journey began with a vision to merge classic elegance with contemporary designs, resulting in timeless pieces that stand out in any setting.

Our Styles

1. Modern Style

Our modern style collection embodies sleek lines, minimalist designs, and functional beauty. Each piece is meticulously crafted to complement modern interiors, offering a seamless blend of aesthetics and functionality. Whether it's a statement sofa, a chic dining table, or a versatile storage solution, our modern furniture exudes sophistication and elegance.

2. Retro Style

Drawing inspiration from the iconic designs of the mid-20th century, our retro style collection captures the nostalgia of bygone eras while adding a fresh, modern twist. From vintage-inspired armchairs to retro-themed coffee tables, our furniture pieces celebrate timeless design elements, vibrant colors, and playful patterns that add character to any space.

3. Scandinavian Style

Known for its simplicity, functionality, and emphasis on natural materials, our Scandinavian style collection embodies the essence of Nordic design. Clean lines, light tones, and organic textures define this collection, creating a sense of warmth, comfort, and serenity. Whether you're looking for a cozy Scandinavian-inspired bed or a stylish yet practical workspace, our furniture captures the essence of Scandinavian living.

Our Craftsmanship

At Vassilissa Furniture, we take pride in our craftsmanship. Each piece is crafted with precision using premium materials to ensure durability, comfort, and aesthetic appeal. Our skilled artisans combine traditional techniques with modern innovations to create furniture that not only looks exquisite but also stands the test of time.

Our Commitment

  • Quality Assurance : We adhere to strict quality standards to deliver furniture that meets and exceeds your expectations.
  • Customer Satisfaction : Your satisfaction is our priority. We strive to provide exceptional customer service and personalized experiences.
  • Sustainability : We are committed to eco-friendly practices, sourcing materials responsibly, and reducing our environmental footprint.

Get in Touch

Explore our collections online or visit our showroom to experience the elegance and craftsmanship of Vassilissa Furniture. Whether you're furnishing a cozy home or a contemporary workspace, we have the perfect pieces to enhance your living environment.

Elevate your space with Vassilissa Furniture - Where Style Meets Comfort!

Located in Jepara Indonesia, the company provide high quality Teak Wood Furniture and Teak Reclaimed / Recycled Furniture. Years of experience make our furniture to be a world class product. Our products has been exported to many countries all over the world.

Our teak patio furniture is manufactured with quality teakwood sourced that we select ourselves from legal government teak plantations and old houses for reclaimed teak items. The teak wood is carefully selected and then drying into kiln dry chamber and produced using proper machines.

The completed items then hand sanded until it is smooth. The greater part of our premium evaluation teak garden furniture is left in itâ€™s common state and we donâ€™t apply any teak oil or other finishing solvents, stains, or varnishes. Simply immaculate and wonderful characteristic teak wood. From the wood determination procedure, to the saw processing, crude materials arrangement, part cutting, get together, getting done with, pressing and stacking, we do all in the genuine assembling manufacture.

We has effectively worked for a long time and keeps continue today on our solid responsibility to produce the items for our clients who need reasonable cost and giving individual and expert support to all of them.

Renowned for producing high-quality Jepara furniture, the company utilizes specially selected premium materials. Their product range encompasses various categories, including sofa sets, dining tables, bedroom sets, and more, all crafted with meticulous attention to detail.
